name: Behnight Marketing
tag_list: online-marketing, video-marketing, ppc, video-seo, website-design-website-development, online-consulting, youtube-marketing, youtube-advertising
overview: Behnight marketing is a video marketing company, operating from Vancouver BC Canada. Our product is producing great videos, and our focus is to help start-ups (especially app developers) introduce their brand and product to their potential prospects online, using video marketing. We all love to watch videos over reading boring text, and having an engaging video that explain your business model quick and clear is very important. We start from doing research on your product to see what problem you are solving, and how it will benefit your costumers. Then we write an engaging script with a little bit of humor, that is easy to understand, and turn it into a video using animation or live action techniques. While we are producing the video, our marketing team will look deeply into your market to find the best websites that your costumers visit on daily basis, so we can plan for advertising the video and finding the right suitable budget that can bring you the most clients.
